about_the_game:
You are just a runner, who keeps running. You are unlucky enough to always end up finding your life in great danger. However, thanks to your amazing parkour skills, you navigate through hazardous environments with ease and live to see another day.
There is always a reason to run for. Whether a security drone chasing you down, unexpected results of failed experiments or (un)planned explosions.

You might be unlucky, but you can still do:

  • Slide and roll
  • Wall run, wall jump and climbing
  • Glide on ropes
  • Vault on obstacles and keep runnin

Key Features:

  • Thematic Environments: Traverse through diverse settings with unique challenges and themes, from neon streets to high-tech labs and immerse yourself in the vibrant and detailed world of Keep Runnin.
  • Thrilling Obstacles: Overcome various obstacles that require precise movements and planning on the run.
  • Intense Pursuits: Try your luck on running away from security drones and environmental hazards that push you to keep running.
  • Fluid Parkour Mechanics: Enjoy smooth and responsive controls that make every jump, slide, and sprint feel natural.
  • Collectible items: Catch different energy drinks scattered throughout the levels during your run to gain boosts and enhance your parkour abilities. Collect unique items and unlock new skins.

Test your reflexes and embrace the excitement of a high-stakes chase in this exhilarating adventure.
Just Keep Runnin!

name: Keep Runnin
short_description: Keep Runnin is a 2D sidescrolling parkour-platformer game where you navigate through various, visually stunning environments, overcome obstacles, and evade unexpected hazards. Test your reflexes and embrace the excitement of a high-stakes chase in this exhilarating adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Azerbaijani
